Lauer was terminated after a colleague filed a complaint this week, according to a statement by NBC News Chairman Andrew Lack. Lauer has not publicly commented on the firing. NBC did not immediately return a request for comment. The news of Lauer's firing comes on the heels of several other high - profile sexual misconduct scandals involving rich and powerful men, including the Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein and Lauer's fellow TV hosts Charlie Rose and Bill O'Reilly.
